Tasks.Task Description: Gather detailed requirements for storage capacity, performance, and redundancy. Identify the applications and workloads that will use StorSimple.
Design the storage architecture, including the placement of StorSimple devices, integration with on-premises and cloud environments, and data tiering strategy.
Order the required StorSimple device from Microsoft or an authorized reseller. Ensure the device model meets the project requirements.
Physically install the StorSimple device in the data center or designated location. Connect it to the network and power supply.
Register the StorSimple device with the Azure portal to enable management and configuration.
Create and configure storage volumes on the StorSimple device. Define volume sizes, access policies, and data protection settings.
Enable encryption for data at rest and in transit. Configure access controls and ensure compliance with organizational security policies.
Set up integration with Azure Backup or other backup solutions to ensure data protection and recovery capabilities.
Perform testing to validate storage performance, including read/write speeds, latency, and failover scenarios.
Set up monitoring and alerting for the StorSimple device using Azure Monitor. Configure alerts for storage capacity, performance, and device health.
Document the storage architecture, configurations, and operational procedures. Provide training to the operations team on managing and troubleshooting StorSimple.
Define a maintenance schedule for firmware updates, hardware checks, and performance tuning of the StorSimple device.
Perform regular audits to ensure compliance with security and operational standards. Verify that the StorSimple device is functioning as expected.
